name: House of Cards Trilogy: House of Cards
summary: Who would be a leader in this wicked world? House of Cards is a delicious tale of political greed, corruption and burning ambition. At its heart is Francis Urquhart, a black-hearted villain with a smiling face, who will stop at nothing and no one in order to achieve the office of Prime Minister. One by one his opponents tumble, until at last there is just one wild card left in the pack. Award winning political drama starring Ian Richardson and Susannah Harker.
